data.trans_hint: Ngôi nhà trông thật đẹp, làm tốt lắm các bạn!
data.en_hint: The house looks great, good job guys!
data.content_game_1: The house looks great, good job guys!
data.answer_en_hint: The house looks great, good job guys!

data.trans_hint: Chị ấy trông thật lộng lẫy!
data.content_game_1: She looks gorgeous!

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy thích nghe những lời khen ngợi về ngoại hình.
data.en_hint: He likes to hear compliments on his appearance.
data.content_game_1: He likes to hear compliments on his appearance.
data.answer_en_hint: He likes to hear compliments on his appearance.

data.trans_hint: Bạn được điểm A trong bài kiểm tra, làm rất tốt đó!
data.en_hint: You got an A in the exam, well done!
data.content_game_1: You got an A in the exam, well done!
data.answer_en_hint: You got an A in the exam, well done!

data.trans_hint: Kỹ năng thuyết trình của bạn thật xuất sắc.
data.content_game_1: Your presentation skill is excellent.
data.answer_en_hint: Your presentation skill is excellent.

data.trans: (Nợ, công việc) Chưa xong, chưa trả hết
data.trans_hint: Anh ấy vẫn còn khoản nợ chưa trả hết là 1000 đô.
data.en_hint: He has outstanding debts of over $1000.
data.content_game_1: He has outstanding debts of over $1000.
data.answer_en_hint: He has outstanding debts of over $1000.

data.trans_hint: Thật đáng kinh ngạc khi nghĩ rằng giám đốc điều hành mới chỉ 23 tuổi.
data.en_hint: It's amazing to think that the managing director is only 23.
data.content_game_1: It's amazing to think that the managing director is only 23.
data.answer_en_hint: It's amazing to think that the managing director is only 23.

data.trans: Thật tuyệt vời, đáng kinh ngạc
data.trans_hint: Tớ vừa mới mua quyển sách vô cùng tuyệt này!
data.en_hint: I have bought this awesome book!
data.content_game_1: I have bought this awesome book!
data.answer_en_hint: I have bought this awesome book!
